Today, I saw a few posts and comments criticizing Koertzen in a very negative way. This was truly a disappointment for me. And it saddens me as a fellow Umpire, to see some of our fans talking about what he didn't do or couldn't do. In cricket, not every decision will be 100% accurate. But that doesn't give anyone the right to talk down on him, especially when he has passed away. Instead, as cricket fans, we should admire his dedication and commitment towards cricket. It is my kind request to anyone who share such content to think again, you have the opportunity to make the right decision.
